short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lead capture, data discovery from LinkedIn to Less Annoying CRM (LACRM)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LACRM Buddy is your best companion for Less Annoying CRM. It helps you extract prospects info from LinkedIn and save them to your LACRM account with just one click.

LACRM Buddy makes prospecting so much simpler and streamlined.
